title: Tziporah Malkah breaks down in tears before revealing her 'final makeover' in a skimpy bikini
text:
Tziporah Malkah is set to unveil her latest makeover on A Current Affair.

In a preview aired on Friday of an upcoming episode, the former '90s model broke down in tears before unveiling her new look.

The 45-year-old, with her usually brunette hair now bright orange, stepped out from behind a partition in the clip, exclaiming: 'I'm back!'

'I'm back!' Tziporah Malkah (picturd) broke down in tears before revealing her 'final makeover' and bright orange hair in a preview clip from A Current Affair which aired on Friday

The voice-over then explained that the model was back, 'raw and uncovered' and is loving life'.

It also explained that she is 'back in a bikini' and showing off her, 'incredible final makeover'.

Tziporah is then seen lying on a beach, from behind, in a skimpy blue and pink floral bikini, her slim form evident.

New look: Tziporah is then seen lying on a beach, from behind, in a skimpy blue and pink floral bikini, her slim form evident. The voice-over then explained she is 'back in a bikini' and showing off her, 'incredible final makeover'

Raw: The reality TV star also broke down in tears during the short video, indicating she will be opening up to the program

The reality TV star also broke down in tears during the short video, indicating she will be opening up to the program.

Having lost a staggering 50kg, Tziporah spoke about her dramatic weight loss to A Current Affair earlier this year.

Reflecting on her journey, she said: 'I was above 120kg. I've gone from a size 24 to a 12. I'm about half my size now.'

'I was above 120kg!' The star sported a fuller figure during her stint on I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in 2017

She admitted earlier this year: 'I've gone from a size 24 to a 12. I'm about half my size now'. Pictured on I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in 2017

Slim down: Reflecting on her journey, the model said she had lost over 50 kilos

Healthy: She attributed her weight loss to 'clean eating', meditation, regular exercise sessions and hypnosis therapy

The beauty previously told New Idea magazine: 'I [used to be] in a bad shape, mentally and physically... But now I no longer hate myself, I actually really like me!' Pictured in 2018

She attributed her weight loss to 'clean eating', meditation, regular exercise sessions and hypnosis therapy.

Tziporah added that she felt depressed after being diagnosed as 'morbidly obese' several years ago and 'hid away' from the public eye.
